column2:
leaflet(data) %>% 
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(icon = ~TravelIcons[group], 
               label = ~htmlEscape(labels),
               labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = F, direction = "top",
                                           style = list(
                                               "color" = "black",
                                               "font-family" = "Montserrat",
                                               "font-weight" = "bold",
                                               "font-size" = "12px",
                                               "border-color" = "black"
                                           )))
Assuming "long" and "lat" are longitude and latitude, respectively
